description.lang: Featuring a stunning glass face with an advanced capacitive touch sensor, all you need to do is just use a finger for full dimming control and for turning your lights on and off. Tap the back-lit touch button on the panel to switch on or off, and long-press the same button to smoothly dim the lights. This 1 Touch Panel Dimmer ensures that the brightness intensity set is achieved without any loss. The Hogar 1 Touch Panel Dimmer can operate either independently or as a part of the Hogar smart home automation system, and even with any other certified Z-Wave home automation system. It is an extremely easy-to-use panel that installs in a standard US 2 gang box. Its operating capabilities include a bi-stable mode, a relay mode or touch pulse mode for scene control with a maximum load current of 3 amp. It communicates with the Hogar smart home automation system using the Z-Wave wireless communication protocol.
